snippet: Too little has been done to help poor renters. Now there is a fresh chance to change course.
abstract: Editorial calls attention to fact that federal programs that provide rental assistance to nation's poorest and most vulnerable families are underfinanced; calls on Obama administration and Congress to do more to create more affordable housing and to find funding for much needed assistance programs (Series: The Second Term).
lead_paragraph: Too little has been done to help poor renters. Now there is a fresh chance to change course.
